title: Italian prosecutor: convicted US diplomat held in Portugal
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
A top Italian anti-terrorism prosecutor says an ex-U.S. diplomat convicted of the CIA kidnapping of an Egyptian cleric has been detained in ...
